summary: A foundational class that encapsulates the workflow for running a neural network model in inference mode, handling input preparation, device placement, and execution without gradient tracking. It defines a callable interface that can be specialized to implement various inference strategies such as patch‑wise or sliding‑window processing.
business_intent: Provide a reusable, extensible component that streamlines model evaluation in production or research pipelines, allowing developers to plug in custom inference techniques while ensuring consistent resource handling and reproducibility.
